import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import img from '../assets/carousel/carousel-img.png'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Button, CloseButton, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; import ProductCard from '../components/ProductCard'; import womanCook from '../assets/main-page/woman-cook.png'; import banner1 from '../assets/main-page/banners/banner1.png' import banner2 from '../assets/main-page/banners/banner2.png' import banner3 from '../assets/main-page/banners/banner3.png' import banner4 from '../assets/main-page/banners/banner4.png' import banner5 from '../assets/main-page/banners/banner5.png' import cardImage1 from '../assets/main-page/cards/shipping.png' import cardImage2 from '../assets/main-page/cards/secure-payment.png' import cardImage3 from '../assets/main-page/cards/import.png' import cardImage4 from '../assets/main-page/cards/help.png' import cardImage5 from '../assets/main-page/cards/headphones.png' import ProductGroup from '../components/ProductGroup'; import productImg1 from '../assets/home/Colpac-Recyclable-Kraft-Microwavable-Soup-Cups.jpeg'; import productImg2 from '../assets/home/Disposable-Wooden-Fork-Spoon-Knife.jpeg'; import productImg3 from '../assets/home/Recyclable-Ripple-Wall-Takeaway-Coffee-Cups-Kraft.jpeg'; import productImg4 from '../assets/home/Compostable-Kraft-Food-Boxes.jpeg'; import blog1 from '../assets/home/ChefsFavorites-in-Restaurants.jpeg' import blog2 from '../assets/home/Essential-Horeca-Equipment-and-Features-for-Cafe-Owners.jpeg' import blog3 from '../assets/home/Popular-Horeca-Products-in-London.jpeg' export default function Home() { const products = [ { id: 1, productName: "Colpac Recyclable Kraft Microwavable Soup Cups 225ml : 8oz (Pack of 500)", unitPrice: '5,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg1, }, { id: 2, productName: "Disposable Wooden Fork Spoon Knife", unitPrice: '2,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg2 }, { id: 3, productName: "Recyclable Ripple Wall Takeaway Coffee Cups Kraft 340ml : 12oz", unitPrice: '2,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg3 }, { id: 4, productName: "Compostable Kraft Food Boxes", unitPrice: '1,60', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg4 }, { id: 1, productName: "Colpac Recyclable Kraft Microwavable Soup Cups 225ml : 8oz (Pack of 500)", quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg1, }, { id: 2, productName: "Disposable Wooden Fork Spoon Knife", unitPrice: '2,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg2 }, { id: 3, productName: "Recyclable Ripple Wall Takeaway Coffee Cups Kraft 340ml : 12oz", unitPrice: '2,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg3 }, { id: 4, productName: "Compostable Kraft Food quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg1, }, { id: 2, productName: "Disposable Wooden Fork Spoon Knife", unitPrice: '2,00', quantityPerUnit: "19boxes", image: productImg2 }, { id: 3, Free Shipping

Free Shipping Over 100 GDP

Secure Payment

Your payment is 100% secure with us

Export

You can order from outside the UK

Support

You can reach our support 24/7

Support

You can reach our support 24/7

Mr. Kurt Blog

Chef's Favorites in Restaurants: Best Professional Kitchen Tools

In the fast-paced world of restaurants, professional chefs rely on a carefully curated selection of kitchen tools to elevate their culinary creations. These essential instruments not only save time but also ensure precision, consistency, and efficiency in the kitchen.

Read the Rest

Essential Horeca Equipment and Features for Cafe Owners

Running a successful cafe requires more than just serving delicious coffee and pastries. As a cafe owner, investing in the right equipment and features can significantly impact the efficiency of your operations and the overall experience for your customers.

Read the Rest

Popular Horeca Products in London: Most Preferred Delicacies

London's diverse culinary scene is a delightful melting pot of flavors, influenced by various cultures and traditions. As a global hub for tourism and commerce, the city's Horeca (Hotel/Restaurant/Cafe) sector boasts an array of popular delicacies that cater to both locals and visitors alike.

Read the Rest

Mr. Kurt

At Mr. Kurt, we take immense pride in being a trusted provider of top-tier hospitality products to cafes, restaurants, and hotels throughout London. With our extensive range of premium Horeca supplies, we are dedicated to catering to the diverse needs of your establishments and enhancing your guests' experiences.Thank you for choosing Mr. Kurt as your go-to supplier for quality hospitality products. We are excited to be part of your success story and look forward to building a long-lasting partnership with your esteemed establishment. Elevate your hospitality experience with Mr. Kurt - Where Quality Meets Service.

Mr. Kurt TV
